t: Buying Cologne on Amazon – Busted Myths – FragranceSpotter.com
s: Amazon cologne certainly sits in good warehouses with controlled conditions. All cologne sold by the brand has a sell-by date which the retail adheres to. If a cologne comes dusty it doesn’t mean it’s past its sell-by date or that it’s a fake cologne.
